powergrid.tasks

Class ReturnTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • powergrid.tasks.Task
      • powergrid.tasks.ReturnTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Task>

    public class ReturnTask
extends Task
    Executes a given Task and then returns to the position you were before the Task was executed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReturnTask(Task t)
      Creates a new ReturnTask that executes the given Task and then makes its way back to the original position.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Cancels execution of this ReturnTask.
      void cancelAndReturn()
      Cancels the linked Task, but still executes the TravelTask to get back to the original Point.
      void execute()
      First executes the linked Task of this ReturnTask, and then executes a TravelTask to the position of the Bot before the Task was executed.

      • Methods inherited from class powergrid.tasks.Task

        compareTo, equals, getName, getPriority, hashCode, reset, setName, setPriority, sleep, sleep

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReturnTask

        public ReturnTask(Task t)
        Creates a new ReturnTask that executes the given Task and then makes its way back to the original position.
        Parameters:
        t - the Task to execute

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
        First executes the linked Task of this ReturnTask, and then executes a TravelTask to the position of the Bot before the Task was executed.
        Specified by:
        execute in class Task

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancels execution of this ReturnTask.

        When the original Task is running, this method cancels that Task and also prevents execution of the TravelTask. When the TravelTask is running, this method cancels the TravelTask.

        When the Task is not running, this method does nothing.

        Overrides:
        cancel in class Task

      • cancelAndReturn

        public void cancelAndReturn()
        Cancels the linked Task, but still executes the TravelTask to get back to the original Point.

        When the linked Task is not running, this method does nothing.
